text: Alright, let me walk through the checkout flow real quick.
So I added a couple items to the cart and I'm going to click checkout.
Okay, the checkout page loaded. I'll fill in my shipping address.
I type in my name, street, city, and zip code.
Now I click the continue button and... nothing happens.
Let me try clicking it again. Still nothing. The button doesn't do anything.
Wait, I see a small error message at the bottom. It says invalid zip code.
But I definitely typed a valid zip code. That's a bug for sure.
Okay, let me try a different zip code. I'll use nine zero two one zero.
Alright, that one worked. The payment page loaded.
I'll enter my card details. Card number, expiry, CVV.
I click Place Order and I get a spinner. It's been spinning for about ten seconds.
Okay it's still stuck. The spinner has been going for thirty seconds now.
I think the order is broken. The page is just frozen with the spinner.
I'm going to refresh the page and see what happens.
After refreshing, it looks like the order actually went through. I can see a confirmation.
But the confirmation page is missing the order number. That seems wrong.
Overall the checkout has a few issues that need to be fixed.
